price: Maka mereka mendustakan Syu`ayb, lalu mereka ditimpa gempa yang dahsyat dan jadilah mereka mayat-mayat yang bergelimpangan di tempat-tempat tinggal mereka.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
